properties.name: SHLAA/00195/AVA
properties.site-address: Former Bartons Bus Depot Queens Road West Chilwell
properties.notes: Full permission for 29 dwellings, outline permission for up to 221 further dwellings. Hybrid planning application comprising: Full application to construct 29 dwellings, including access, associated road infrastructure, car parking and landscaping. Outline application (including access) with some matters reserved to construct up to 221 dwellings and units with flexible uses (Classes D1, D2, A1, A2, A3, A4 and A5), following demolition of buildings
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: SHLAA/00237/AVA
properties.notes: This site crossed the boundary with Nottingham City Council therefore the number of dwellings in the description is not expected to be delivered in its entirety within Broxtowe.. Outline application for mixed-use development comprising: up to 82,000sqm of employment floorspace, comprising office units (B1a); research and development (B1b); industrial process (B1c); general industrial (B2); storage and distribution (B8); residential institutions (C2); non-residential institutions (D1); up to 2,500sqm retail & food/drink (A1, A2, A3, A4 and A5); up to 675 residential units (C3); and associated works including demolition of existing structures; earthworks; remediation; access; car parking; pedestrian and cycle routes; open space; utilities; sustainable drainage systems
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority
